Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Madison/LaVergne
ShortDescription: WB 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via: Madison, Cicero, Washington, Laramie and Madison, due to, street blockage, near Madison/LaVergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via: Madison, Cicero, Washington, Laramie and Madison, due to, street blockage, near Madison/LaVergne.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
